headline: Garmin Product Launches And Dividend Plans Shape Growth And Cash Story
summary: Garmin introduced the Garmin Catalyst 2, an advanced motorsports data and coaching device. The company also launched the zumo XT3, a rugged motorcycle GPS with ride analytics features. Garmin expanded its inReach SOS emergency technology across more product lines. International revenues, particularly from EMEA, are growing as part of Garmin’s global push. For investors watching Garmin, NYSE:GRMN, these product launches and safety upgrades reflect a broader push across performance,...
